mapper.select: SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_name, location_name FROM ( SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_id, location_id FROM tbl_store ORDER BY store_name LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}) s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l WHERE s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id ORDER BY store_name

SELECT store_id, store_name, branch_name, store_img, s.category_id, category_name, s.location_id, location_name, store_addr, store_lat, store_lng, store_tel, store_price, store_parking, store_time, store_break, store_holiday, store_website FROM ( SELECT s.store_id, store_name, branch_name, store_img, category_id, location_id, store_addr, store_lat, store_lng, store_tel, store_price, store_parking, store_time, store_break, store_holiday, store_website FROM tbl_store s, tbl_store_detail d WHERE s.store_id = d.store_id AND s.store_id = #{storeId}) s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l WHERE s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_store_detail SET branch_name = #{branchName}, store_addr = #{storeAddr}, store_lat = #{storeLat}, store_lng = #{storeLng}, store_tel = #{storeTel}, store_price = #{storePrice}, store_parking = #{storeParking}, store_time = #{storeTime}, store_break = #{storeBreak}, store_holiday = #{storeHoliday}, store_website = #{storeWebsite} WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_store (store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_id, location_id) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{storeName}, #{storeImg}, 0.0, #{categoryId}, #{locationId})

INSERT INTO tbl_store_detail (store_id, branch_name, store_addr, store_lat, store_lng, store_tel, store_price, store_parking, store_time, store_break, store_holiday, store_website) VALUES (#{storeId}, #{branchName}, #{storeAddr}, #{storeLat}, #{storeLng}, #{storeTel}, #{storePrice}, #{storeParking}, #{storeTime}, #{storeBreak}, #{storeHoliday}, #{storeWebsite})
